value.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
value.excerpt: Integrate data sources with your Azure Functions serverless logic by using bindings.

images.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings

value.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage
value.excerpt: You will compare the different APIs available in Azure Cosmos DB, highlighting and contrasting the different scenarios that would make them a good choice for a company.

images.title: Choose the appropriate API for Azure Cosmos DB storage

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement text moderation with the Azure Content Moderator service.

images.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator

value.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API
value.excerpt: Learn what your customers are really saying about your product or brand when they send feedback. We'll create a solution that uses Azure Functions and the intelligence of the Text Analytics API to discover sentiment in text messages.

images.title: Discover sentiment in text with the Text Analytics API

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Introduction to adding conversational intelligence to your apps by using language understanding (LUIS)

images.title: Add conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)

value.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
value.excerpt: Understand the structure of role definitions for access control. Identify the role properties to use that define your custom role permissions. Create a custom Azure role and assign to a user.

images.title: Create custom roles for Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)

value.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure
value.excerpt: In this module, you explore the platform compliance criteria that is stipulated by SAP for deploying SAP solutions in Azure. In addition, you will look at the options for deploying SAP in Azure.

images.title: Deploy SAP certified offerings on Azure

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and errors.

images.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates

value.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Simplify and protect access to devices and apps with intelligent identity and access management to increase security and productivity with Microsoft 365.

images.title: Describe the identity and access management capabilities of Microsoft 365

value.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
value.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

value.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
value.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

images.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure

value.title: Design your migration to Azure
value.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Site Recovery and Azure Database Migration Service.

images.title: Design your migration to Azure

value.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools
value.excerpt: Use the Azure Functions Core Tools to create and run functions on a development computer and publish them to Azure.

images.title: Develop, test, and publish Azure Functions by using Azure Functions Core Tools

value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

images.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway

value.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data
value.excerpt: Learn about non-relational databases, and how they compare to relational databases. Understand the different types of non-relational databases commonly used by applications.

images.title: Explore concepts of non-relational data

value.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export
value.excerpt: Evaluate Azure Import/Export to copy data from Azure Blob storage to an on-premises server. Create an export job in your Azure Storage account. Get the BitLocker keys to unlock the drives that you receive.

images.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export

value.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase
value.excerpt: Load petabytes of data into an Azure Synapse Analytics database in minutes by using PolyBase.

images.title: Import data into Azure Synapse Analytics by using PolyBase

value.title: Introduction to Node.js
value.excerpt: Learn everything about Node.js: what it is, how does it work and when to use it.

value.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
value.excerpt: Organizations big and small have started to realize just how crucial system and application reliability is to their business. They’ve also learned just how difficult it is to maintain that reliability while iterating at the speed demanded by the marketplace. Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a proven approach to this challenge.

images.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

value.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: With the recently expanded partnership between Microsoft and SAP, you can run SAP applications across development, test, and production scenarios in Azure, taking advantage of the scalability, flexibility, and cost savings of Microsoft Azure.

images.title: Introduction to Azure for SAP workloads

value.title: Introduction to GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

images.title: Introduction to GitHub

value.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to strengthen authentication across your enterprise deployment with security tools from Microsoft 365.

images.title: Strengthen authentication with Microsoft 365

value.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage
value.excerpt: Discover the tools available to detect and correct problems with your Azure Storage to enable your cloud storage infrastructure to operate at peak performance.

images.title: Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot your Azure storage

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non-shared host/server bare-metal hardware.

images.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore relational data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore relational data offerings, provisioning and deploying relational databases, and querying relational data through cloud data solutions with Microsoft Azure.

topItems.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, Azure Database for MySQL, and Azure Database for MariaDB. Explore scenarios for using these database management systems.

images.title: Explore relational data offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provision and configure Azure SQL Database, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, and Azure Database for MySQL.

images.title: Explore provisioning and deploying relational database offerings in Azure

topItems.title: Query relational data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Structured Query Language (SQL), and how you can use it to query, insert, update, and delete data in a relational database.

images.title: Query relational data in Azure
Explore relational data offerings in Azure

value.title: Implement a secure environment for a database service
value.excerpt: Implement SQL Server-based options for authentication and authorization, as well as Azure options for securing Azure SQL databases. Explore encryption, firewalls and advanced threat protection.

topItems.title: Configure database authentication and authorization
topItems.excerpt: Contrast authentication using Azure Active Directory vs Windows Active Directory vs SQL Server authentication. Implement various security principals and configure permissions.

topItems.title: Protect data in-transit and at rest
topItems.excerpt: Protect data in-transit and at rest

topItems.title: Implement compliance controls for sensitive data
topItems.excerpt: Explore data classification capabilities and degrees of confidentiality. Explore and configure advanced threat protection options, including SQL Injection.

value.title: Process and Translate Speech with Azure Cognitive Speech Services
value.excerpt: Learn how to implement the Speech services found in Azure Cognitive Services by performing speech-to-text transcription, synthesizing text input to speech, performing speech translation, and implementing speaker recognition in your AI infused applications.

topItems.title: Transcribe speech input to text
topItems.excerpt: Speech-to-text from the speech service,  known as speech recognition, enables real time transcription of audio streams into text. Your applications, tools, or devices can consume, display, and take action on this text as command input.

images.title: Transcribe speech input to text

topItems.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

images.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech

topItems.title: Translate speech with the speech service
topItems.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

images.title: Translate speech with the speech service
Transcribe speech input to text

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
value.excerpt: AI has the capacity to empower the whole world to achieve more. From empowering technical development teams to mobilizing an entire organization to unlock the true potential of AI, enterprises need to think strategically about AI – and they need to start today.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value
